description:
Cyber Intel Classification Banner

The Cyber Intel Classification Banner (CICB) is software that displays and marks sensitive or classified output across computer screens when required. This is the perfect information classification solution with many useful extended features for the Windows and Linux platforms.

Version 2.3.2.38 includes:
- Updated installer with simplified component selection
- Enhanced deployment manager with version display
- Improved LDAP integration
- Performance improvements and bug fixes
- Simplified installer with single component selection
- Deploy Manager now displays version in window title
- Updated installer flags (-Installer instead of -Setup)
- WiX Toolset support for native MSI generation
- Auto-installation of missing development tools
- Enhanced LDAP functionality
